posts.post_content:
Taking offers on this beautiful and very tough Cobb. Not too many 42's out there, especially ones that present this nicely. The card is graded a 1 due to some chipping on his name and around the border, but the picture itself is not chipped and the back is very clean. If you're interested, PM me or shoot me an email at [url]eppersmatt@yahoo.com[/url] and lets work something out!

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=182452&d=1426084369[/IMG]

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=182453&d=1426084377[/IMG]
That's the nicest looking PSA 1 I've ever seen. Good luck with the sale!!
Thanks guys! All emails replied to
Great card and super great response. Thank you, Matt!
